name: Citigroup Inc.
summary: Citigroup Inc., commonly known as Citi, is a leading American multinational banking and financial services corporation headquartered in New York City. Established in 1998 through the merger of Citicorp and Travelers Group, Citi traces its origins to 1812 and now serves around 200 million customers in over 160 countries. The company offers a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer and corporate banking, investment banking, securities brokerage, and wealth management, and is recognized as one of the worldâ€™s largest financial institutions.
